title: Falcon Eye
description: Architected and optimized a real-time synthetic vision stack for low-visibility flight, delivering deterministic 3D terrain reconstruction on constrained avionics hardware.
ctaText: See how Falcon Eye turned simulation-grade rendering into certifiable flight software

title: Spuddie
description: Designed and implemented a long-term memory architecture for an AI companion, enabling structured context retention and cross-session continuity.
ctaText: Explore the memory architecture behind persistent AI companions

title: Findability Sciences
description: Improved enterprise ML reliability by engineering outlier detection and data validation layers across production training pipelines.
ctaText: See how production ML pipelines were stabilized under noisy data conditions

title: Venture Shares
description: Led frontend architecture for a market analytics platform, designing scalable dashboard systems integrated with real-time financial data streams.
ctaText: Read how production-grade financial dashboards were architected and shipped
